extensionAttribute.description: Checks to see whether the computer has automatic updates set
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/bash #Script to verify the status of Auto Updates #to ensure Critical and Security updates are applied #By Quam Sodji Copyright 2015
### Check for schedule, critical and config settings schedule_status=$(softwareupdate --schedule) critical_status=$(defaults read /Library/Preferences/com.apple.SoftwareUpdate CriticalUpdateInstall 2>/dev/null) config_status=$(defaults read /Library/Preferences/com.apple.SoftwareUpdate ConfigDataInstall 2>/dev/null) run_config=$(softwareupdate --background-critical)
### The expected settings for schedule, critical and config schedule_on="Automatic check is on" critical_on="1" config_on="1"
if [ "$schedule_status" == "$schedule_on" ] && [ "$critical_status" == "$critical_on" ] && [ "$config_status" == "$config_on" ]; then
result="Enabled" else result="Disabled" fi
echo "<result>$result</result>"
